name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 21, a mountain torrent occurred in Jinyang, Sichuan, and a dangerous situation occurred at the construction site of the JN1 section of the Yanjiang Expressway project, causing 4 deaths and 48 people missing. 
Five people including Liu from the project department and the labor service company were suspected of "not reporting or falsely reporting a safety accident" and were criminally detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Under the video of Taipei Mayor Chiang Wan-an visiting the mainland
Netizens expressed their warm welcome

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the popular Shenzhen traffic policeman "Officer Xiong" who is loved by netizens was rumored to have been transferred to Dapeng New District because he offended his superiors.
On August 30, Officer Xiong refuted the rumor, saying that he was transferred normally and the rumor was "too far-fetched".
Interestingly, after Officer Xiong was transferred, the official Weibo of "Shenzhen Traffic Police" no longer supported netizens' reports, and even called the reporter to ask him to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Relevant information of Dongying Love Rescue Center
The person in charge of Dongying Love Rescue Center said that the sponsored girl is from a single-parent family. Her younger brother had a car accident in 2021 and had undergone 4 craniotomies, with medical expenses of 300,000 to 400,000 yuan. The person in charge said that after verification, the bag was bought by the girl online for more than 190 yuan, and the mobile phone was also a classmate's. The online rumors had a great impact on the girl.

content: On August 31, residents of a residential area in Chaoyang District, Beijing, hung a banner

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On August 31, a netizen revealed that Jolin Tsai's previous concert tours in Shanghai and Guangzhou were reported by people, saying that some audience members wore clothes that "violated public order and good morals" and rainbow lights
The ticket booking text message for the Changsha concert on September 2 reminded that "dressing must not violate public order and good morals."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, media reported that a sushi restaurant in Xianyang was suspected to have been set on fire late at night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The body is very honest"
On August 31, in a video released by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, the famous patriotic V Gu Yan Mu Chan wore a belt from the famous Italian luxury brand GUCCI, worth RMB 4,400.
After discovering this, some netizens questioned that he had called on netizens not to buy LOGO premium products, and said that he no longer buys any foreign luxury goods.
In the end, he complained about "personal attacks" and his blog was deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that the disaster area in Baoding, Hebei has begun calling on victims to donate to them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The information we have received so far is that some users who made "step down" remarks were summoned by the police, and I believe this is not an isolated case.
